values: about everything, at least i portray a different state of mind by faking smiles and rejecting thoughts that drown, but soon

is as great as being in company it doesnt matter what kind, i guess solitude is one of the scariests thoughts that gallop about my head daily and just like that *swoosh it gains ground and little by little devours the weak walls of my brain, oh shit! the case of the blah blah blahs again and twice today with orgasmic energy i destroyed every feeling of despondency and ugliness that lays deep with in, i win!

im not in the mood for anything, im pretty much a walking drunken fuck-mess, im not in the mood for romance and everyone is ugly, or maybe it's just that i have built up walls the size of jericho's defences. for the past couple of days i have done things that i regret deeply and i wanna stay away from any more confussion, it's not hard, i just roll with the hype, i guess thinking is killing time and killing time is wasting away my inner consious, huh?

it's werid how some days bring about our realization of loneliness, i mean, what is the point of life?
if it isnt to make ourselves happy? there are sooo many things that can be oferred to the exchange of nothing, it's silly! i mean we all have our expectations of what someone will be like and we dream...
but are we really waiting for that? are we easy targets to people that pay full price for a rat bat hotels?
im not easy! yet im not that hard, i peel away like early morning sickness
we are kings amongst runaways
i cry on days like this, just out of contempt and idiosincrasy, im not that big to get by
after all im just a peck of silence in a bed of noise created by our talking innuendo, yours!
im eating left overs bro! speak to me, tell me something sweet before i kill this shit
before i said anything, we just thought-so! but i dont think that! but i dont out-go
and i dont think-so, cause when i self doubt-so,  i go go and fuck out-source\]\-0\

i sleep around in my room, sometimes i even re-arange my room and pretend it's someone else's
we sit on the bed and have intricate conversations about nothing
we stare at eachother and giggle naughtily
towards the end of the night i usually say "i never really do this, i'm embarrassed and uncomfortable"
then you whisper in my ear "it doesnt have to be today"
so we just sleep, like little kids, with our backs against eachother

i wake up in my room, as if i was transported back in the middle of the night, abducted by reality
i make brakefast for two and feed the other portion to the dogs

you can call it crazy, but i call it saturday nights

i have dreams of cosmic vibrations
cock cock cock 
 cum and asphyxiation

new nurturded swallow pride milk, the kind that gets them flying high and mighty
to boost me up like second hand smoke and cigarette butts liter
im not so much into derogatory language but yet intrigued by you and the way you speak
the moves you make and the blinking in your eyes so fastly, gets me puching bags incessantly
it kills me when you think out loud, making me whisper within myslef "god damn"
darn cats loose again and his troop is aiming right down the barrel 
it's nothing when compared to most but much too many when it comes to me
i'm simple and way too undercrust maybe a tad too sharpened for the taste of bitter
and now so long is farther up than the ride downtown
your clean i crave for satisfaction and the in between is just my AIM 
to be alone and sit around talking about kids and what thereof

happy new years! although i know that to some people next year won't be all that great. people will die things will get robbed and the dollar will keep on falling, so will the economy. people will get sick and some will lose their pets, some mothers will cry and some husbands will hit their wives, people will cheat and cows will be sacrificed in religious rituals, lies will be told and people will cry. cars will be crashed and some totaled, nails will get chipped and teeth will be knocked, people will fight, get stabbed, get hit by cars, join the navy, get aids, get cancer and teens will get knocked up. people will commit suicide and some will get murdered, someone's kid will swallow a golf ball, and someone's daughter will be born with some crazy unidentifiable illness that will take her life. the president will still suck, and religious organizations will shape our society in such a way that we must succumb, drugs will be abused so will alcohol, thousands of restraining orders will be filed, shots fired and terrorist will terrorize. planes will fall and helicopters too, acid rain and deforestation will kill protected species as we eat our burgers, tsunamis will terrify the asians and the MIGRA(emigration) the mexicans, my soccer team will lose and so will my ego. valuable things will be thrown away such as virginity and morality. girls will get raped and little boys abused by the hands that guide them. one third of the world will lack their daily bread, for at least a couple of days. and things won't change, life will still be pointless and we will still marry corporate amerikkka. is next year really gonna be that happy, can it really be?

people everywhere are celebrating their love, couples laugh joyfully as they share their big macs and biggie fries and im here building me a pizza.
 why is this day such a drag for me always, i guess is just the realization that there is an empty void in my life and there has always been one, even though at times i felt myself fullfilled, it was all as real as a flying midget or bullshit to put it in perspective. i have always been empty inside of that certain person and i just for some wierd reason think that i would never get over it. i pass more time analyzing what went wrong in my past relationships than trying to find one. i masturbate until my penis is red and i lost my craving for sexual interaction, now there is the problem. i feel that can never compromise shit, i like my pizza with basil and garlic that's it! that's what im having. i want it my way i don't wanna put myself in the back seat of an oldsmobile and go along for a dreary ride downtown. relationships suck!!! more than kirby does!
so today i sit twirling my uncurly hair. thinking about how great it would be to walk hand in hand to our favorite restaurant, smiling big time! with hearts in our looks and love in our speech. sharing a strawberry shortcake (our favorite) later walking down our own little secret spot at our favorite local beach to later lay on the hammock on top of eachother while looking at the stars and repeating over and over the words i have yet to hear ( ilove you, so much) sex that night would be great, our bodies would melt in the heat of SLOW copulation during the long long night. in the morning we would wake up and with a smile remember why we did everything we did last night, i'll bring you breakfast in bed whatever you want. weeks later our schedules will be full and we will always be on a rush and even though will be living in the same house we will never really have time for a real conversation, you'll tell your mother and your friends that i don't appreciate you and i'll long for the day you can trust me, you will then tell me that you never really liked garlic and that basil gives you a heart-burn and that my red jacket looks way too faded. you'll stop cooking and spend more time with your friends and suddenly we have fallen apart, but we will still tell eachother that we love us, because we know that when valentines day comes we can sex again, until it becomes rutine and then you run away with that cute spanish lad from sweden. then i would loose faith in love and companionship and i'll spend the rest of my life in west hollywood herrasing boys and paying them for blow jobs, then one day i'll put a bullet through my head. then you send me a post card. love sean from dublin (it's cold down here) :) visit me soon!

and so i was buried, deep beneth the concrete life that was to be discovered, people took pictures and brought flowers "a statue of what"
a statue of nothing but pity and despondency so severe that i was to be remembered as "that monument over thurr" marble never looked so weak, so fragile since "la pieta" was sculped by that ninja turtle, four walls so cold and white and no corner is confortable in my dungeon of darkness so bright, i'm wearing this smile of accomplishment and relief, yet i think that death it must be killing me, and i'm afraid of boredom and solitude, those two fucking idiots creep in and i'm always defeated, yet im happy and content, but what is happiness but a word

(the first use of the word happiness was recorded in 1340 it derrives from the word "hap" which means "chance and furtune" as in riches and wealth. then it went to mean lucky )

so that makes me think, what is happiness but a word that was just first put on paper in the 12th century, what about before that word came out, was there no need to be happy, it didn't exist, no one felt the pressure to be happy, no one wanted happiness, then after that our society has enbedded in our little weak minds that happiness is what life is about, now i sit here i wouldn't go as far as saying i'm happy, but im most definately in the best place i have ever been in my whole entire life, yet things knock me down and this whole money situation devours my insides like a fucking maggot and boredom kills me and i sink, and im sinking and im sinking sink sink sink sink sink sink sunk........

heard it on tv, i heard it on the radio two days before yesterdays sunset, and people were telling me and signs couldn't have suggested otherwise, the river was flowing with glittery water and old faithful kept smoking and killing himself, so i just woke up from what would have been a "permanent state of discomfort". so i'm awake and you should be too! it's two o'clock in the afternoon, god damn it open your eyes as wide as mine and look at that worry-less squirrel gathering acorns for dear life crossing the street, i bet she is happy and that's why they have balls that big! when i was little mother took me to communists cell meetings they sold us garbanzos a ticket, a ticket cost a nickle and everybody was angelic----i'm not sorry!

and so will life, unprotected sex, wreckless driving, knifes and guns and therefore i'm not afraid, i'm not afraid of dying and i'm not afraid of living, i'm not afraid of laughing and more importantly i'm not afraid of being me! it's raining and storming outside, cats and dogs are falling like fish when they fry, and god has killed another kitten  so what else can happen in such an unevenful day? many things are bound to happen and down at the local hick bar some girl is loosing her virginity and some corporate fuck is cheating on his wive, and yet i'm happy cause i know that life is good and i will open my window and breathe in all the particles of rain and earthly soil , cause the scent of wet soil reminds me of purity and lazyness of relaxation and meditation of life as pure as it can be, the two elements nescessary for sustainance. i went out to my lanai and i sat there staring out into the distance and it was all so beautiful suddenly i needed no light to see the magic and the music of the drops falling fast on the wooden roof, reminded me of sailing the mediterranean, over there we have gilbaltar and to your right ceuta and there you can see casablanca and..and madrid by cape verde to you left italy is sicilia! and the worlds so big, all on the palm of my hand and no corner is dark and no situation is an end, i'se learned this much!!!
and tomorrow i will awaken to yet another sweet dream,

and so it's raining and thundering. it's dark and im obliged to tell you:

strap on to your seat belt
wear goggles when mixing dangerous chemicals
iron toe booots are better for construction work than chucks
and looking stupid isn't just a fad
think big when looking around the broccoli forest
allow yourself to be taken for granted
expectations suck and so do prunes
(by the way calling it dried prune juice, doesn't make it more appealing!)
beer isn't supposed to taste like candy, it's suppossed to taste like broken hearts!
pennies are useless
and hamsters are the best!
meat will make you puke your heart out david! so why bother kid, you are so masochistic and so who isn't?
larry clark and kristy alley aren't
why am i such a psyco? 
you can hear crickets at night get the weather man to blow them away, haha love is a desert and i need it to rain!
life is taking a poop on society and so me too.
kill me wonder boy for i am either crazy or permanently drunk!
if you are a wizard why do you wera glasses?

that's a pretty ugly heart you got there mister.
why don't you go get a fresh new one.

far love, love farther fails to reach the destined thought of recipient, and i can sense that aprehenssion that momemt of hesitation hurts, and so i cry sad lone thoughts, that vacancy in my heart needs soon be sealed, tape and liquid bandaids shall keep my puny heart-agoing.
kissing my dreams away i breath amonia and roses, coffee grounds in between my teeth a smile of a russian lumberjack, chopping chopping my wood away, killing your forest and peeing on your yard in my brain, it's a thought of you that makes me stay awake oh! sleepless hours counted (22hrs) i napped and i sexed in dream not with you but with my own self endulgency and pleassure i woke up scared and in panic, where is my hand and why has it fallen aleep so suddenly? is it because you are bigger than me? or am i not worth of being alone so that once i wake up i can stare at you when i blink, im not in love or in hate, i just miss those days where we drunk in the park, the beach and your inner patio. i have the tendency of falling short and so i don't miss you that much i miss no one, so is that a contradiction? i just wanna be around you just to drink beer and chat, have you heard what happened in venezuela, aparently a woman swallowed her tounge after not speaking for a month, yeah she died after hours of being misss-diagnosed at the hospital, it was birth, a new freedom after death and tears so pretty, did she miss me? or you? or both, a fag

eating glass is like thinking out loud, me killing a cow.
like the world on a bed of nails, is the air in your lungs and the holes
in you skin, the space that separetes you and "I" with a glass of pinot grillio besides
your tall tale lie, eating glass is a habit like drinking to sleep and 
scratching to think, i have a rare disease of low self-esteem and a
gun under my pillow for unshattered cups, eating glass is like
digesting a mouse with the cord still attached, somber air of 
rotten milk and pleasant surprises, a dead bag of something on your way home
eating glass is a tendency that i must attend to, like coming of age
and coming clean, all is hard to swallow.

it's colored all over my body, watch my skin glow look at my hair adorn my lips.
it's my favorite color, the color of love and death and of what's in between.
life is a blank canvas in which you paint what you've been told.
all in you favorite color, mine is content. 
reds and violets a dozen to be ecxact, arrived by hear say
and i painted them all in a shade of pretty with a dash of tears
nothings is better than painting in you favorite shade,
mine is gray. there are really no stable colors
life is a composition, a repetition of air and sounds.
there are incidents reminiscent of the era of the sun, but nothing more.

it's been a lifetime since i stared at myself from without (a couple of hours to be exact), and i have learned something new about myself.
That i thrive on pity, that i like walking barefooted on wet grass and that i have made a lover out of solitude
i'm worried about NEXT and unsure about yesterday (did i really struggle? or was it my willingness to be)
i'm on the other side of the slidding door, vaporized now-fog
is it that im fragile? (a thread of emotion) so much that my thoughts are dangerously close to snapping the tangled veins that support my heart head high?
-that's the catch, the homerunned baseball. there is something that i know that im not telling me, 
worries are contagious and like a good virus they can cause emotional damage, such as misplaced vision and coffee-house migranes.
i know by experience, today i enjoyed a wondeful set of events that originated with me thinking about "what now" then the door opened and images poured
cascading down my nasal cavities to explote!

setting myself on fire
because my skin burning and my veins are a-swollen
my heart is in the mood of ripping itself apart.
----------so shall i help?

why pretend? im alone, alone as a fucking mistletoe in the summer.
so it's been summer for too fucking long and im done, so i wither

time squanderers and adrenaline rush dummies.
psychopaths and middle class bafoons decked out in fake paris gear.
the trendsetters and the ones who watch them set them with admiration
wishing they could be more like them.
this highway is for racists, fascists and faggots
daddy's kids and dad himself will drive trough here, littering american spirit butts
all kinds of people flickering lights at 80 mph
until a fast food billboard, like flies to rotting flesh- they splurge
 i'm taking the next exit to somersville, connecticut

happy birthday dad! i love you 
thank you for everything, guess what i made you a present (no it's not shredded soap bars)
good god i how i love you! i can't wait to see you on tuesday so we can celebrate talking over beers (shit times has passed so fast)
did you ever picture this when i was little? did you ever pictured me this big? did you ever see me in your dreams growned up? did you ever picture me being a FAG? or did you forget tot hink that?
you seem the same to me, i guess b/c it's me that's changing physically as time progresses, you have managed to keep that youthful stare and that funny laughter, wee have many things to do togather still.
